title: Hi ! I write this blog
summary: 3 things you want to know about me
body:
Hello, My name is Quentin Chenevier. I live in [Toulouse, France](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Toulouse). If you are interested in better knowing me, here are 3 things you might want to know about me: - I like **Machines** - I like **Humans** - I like to **discuss** about it ## Why I like Machines I've studied many different machines and I'm really happy to study complex systems built by Humans. I graduated in 2010 from the [Ecole Polytechnique](https://www.polytechnique.edu/en), which is a great place to learn science & technology. From there, I had the opportunity to work on **amazingly complex** machines which fly in all kind of environments: - In space, like [spectrometers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infrared_atmospheric_sounding_interferometer) - In the sky, like [cockpits](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cockpit) - In the cloud, like [data science apps](http://www.airbus.com/newsroom/press-releases/en/2017/06/airbus-launches-new-open-aviation-data-platform--skywise--to-sup.html) All those machines have one thing in common: they **process huge amounts of Information**.


The Ecole Polytechnique is a military school. We have funny hats, and we are proud of it.

## Why I like Humans I've discovered meditation in 2016 and it's helping me to understand my own thinking processes and having empathy for others. As a result, I started to read a lot about psychology, sociology and cognitive sciences. Since then, the beauty of the Human's mind and the complexity of its inner workings has never stopped to amaze me. I graduated an MBA in 2018 from the [Toulouse Business School](http://www.tbs-education.fr/en), which is a great place to learn business, sociology & management. From there, I began to be passionate about how organizations work. After all, they are complex systems made of Humans & Machines made by Humans. > Note: I will publish soon my MBA thesis on **Digitalization & Organisations**.


We also have funny hats in Toulouse Business School and we are also proud of it.

## I like to discuss I would by happy to discuss with you, feel free to contact me: - on twitter: [@q_chenevier](https://twitter.com/q_chenevier) - on linkedin: [@qchenevier](https://www.linkedin.com/in/qchenevier/) - on medium: [@qchenevier](https://medium.com/@qchenevier)
